00203 inline MC2String
00204 UTF8Util::ucsToUtf8( uint32 ucs )
00205 {
00206    char tmp[8];
00207    unicodeToUtf8( ucs, tmp );
00208    return tmp;
00209 }
00210 
00211 inline MC2String
00212 UTF8Util::ucsToMc2( uint32 ucs )
00213 {
00214 #ifdef MC2_UTF8
00215    return UTF8Util::ucsToUtf8( ucs );
00216 #else
00217    return UTF8Util::ucsToIso( ucs );
00218 #endif
00219 }

00221 #ifdef MC2_UTF8
00222 inline const MC2String&
00223 #else
00224 inline MC2String
00225 #endif
00226 UTF8Util::utf8ToMc2( const MC2String& str )
00227 {
00228 #ifdef MC2_UTF8
00229    return str;
00230 #else
00231    return UTF8Util::utf8ToIso( str );
00232 #endif
00233 }

00236 #ifdef MC2_UTF8
00237 inline const MC2String&
00238 #else
00239 inline MC2String
00240 #endif
00241 UTF8Util::mc2ToUtf8( const MC2String& str )
00242 {
00243 #ifdef MC2_UTF8
00244    return str;
00245 #else
00246    int inlen = str.length();
00247    int outlen = 0;
00248    // The MC2SimpleStringNoCopy will delete [] the convStr when we return
00249    MC2SimpleStringNoCopy convStr( isoToUtf8( str.c_str(), &outlen, &inlen ) );
00250    return convStr.c_str();
00251 #endif
00252 }
